role_description: Currently working on EDUCARE in APAC to bring on-demand medical education to Healthcare Professionals.
Dabbled with Frontend web development to cater for payment-related features within a form builder system.
Built AI-based form input features (integrated with Azure OpenAI's APIs) to generate forms based on one-liner prompts or PDF uploads.
Took a sabbatical from work; Enrolled in a Software Development Bootcamp to pick up some technical skills!
Managed a Website Building and Hosting Platform for the Government; worked with an awesome team of Designers and Engineers to translate roadmap vision to a reality.
Oversaw the onboarding of over 330 school sites on to our platform.
Managed the main Incentive Management System in the organisation.
Had the opportunity to be seconded to Pivotal Labs (VMWare Tanzu Labs) to learn the agile practices of working in balanced teams or squads.
Managed the main Appointment Booking System for the hospital, handling appointments for Specialist Outpatient Clinics (SOCs), and referrals from local Polyclinics.
